monsterDetails.exploreAbilityDescription: - Activates ice orbs - Activates lightning orbs
monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Aura: At the start of the turn, remove a Debuff from each Monster in the party.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Whenever this Monster applies a Debuff to an enemy, 35% chance to spread that Debuff to another enemy.

skills.name: Auto Heal
skills.description: When attacking, also heal the Monster with the lowest health in the party by 200% of Magic.

skills.name: Auto Restore
skills.description: When attacking, also remove 2 Debuffs from the Monster with the most Debuffs in the party.

skills.name: Ball Lightning
skills.description: 8 x 70% (560%) magical damage (wind) - Triggers Shock (Debuff) Damage on all enemies every hit has a 15% chance to apply Shock (Debuff).

skills.name: Blizzard
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Chill (Debuff).

skills.name: Chilling Cold
skills.description: Every Water attack hit has a 15% chance to apply Chill.

skills.name: Curse Breaker
skills.description: Aura: At the start of the turn, remove a Debuff from each Monster in the party.

skills.name: Curse Chain
skills.description: Whenever this Monster applies a Debuff to an enemy, 35% chance to spread that Debuff to another enemy.

skills.name: Deep Freeze
skills.description: 4 x 85% (340%) magical damage (water) Deals an additional 40% hit for every Chill on the target

skills.name: Deep Freeze Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 110% (440%) magical damage (water) Deals an additional 40% hit for every Chill on the target

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 37)

skills.name: Disease Control
skills.description: Receive 4% reduced damage from a debuffed enemy for each Debuff on them.

skills.name: Dominance
skills.description: Aura: Enemies receive 3% increased damage for each Debuff on them.

skills.name: Earth Weakness
skills.description: Earth damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Energize
skills.description: Unique Aura: Monsters in the party recover 7.5% of Max Health when they trigger Shock damage.

skills.name: Fire Weakness
skills.description: Fire damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Freeze
skills.description: 5 x 30% (150%) magical damage (water) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Freeze Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) magical damage (water) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Freeze Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 45% (270%) magical damage (water) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Freeze Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 60% (360%) magical damage (water) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Freeze Lvl 5
skills.description: 7 x 60% (420%) magical damage (water) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Frostbite
skills.description: Unique Aura: When a Monster in the party applies Chill on an enemy, 40% chance to also apply Armor Break.

skills.name: Healing Shield
skills.description: Healing skills (active and passive) also apply a Shield equal to 20% of the amount healed.

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Hexing Support
skills.description: Whenever this Monster spends a turn without attacking an enemy, apply a random Debuff on a random enemy.

skills.name: Initial Chill
skills.description: Apply Chill (Debuff) to a random enemy at the start of combat.

skills.name: Initial Shock
skills.description: Apply Shock (Debuff) on a random enemy at the start of combat.

skills.name: Magic Penetration
skills.description: Aura: Mage Monsters in the party ignore 15% of the target's Defense damage reduction value.

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Magic Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 35% of Magic value.

skills.name: Mana Focus
skills.description: Mana and Mana Regeneration values from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Mana Healing
skills.description: Healing actions trigger an additional Heal on the Monster with the lowest Health equal to 50% of Max Mana value.

skills.name: Mana Overload
skills.description: Increase Attack and Magic by 15% of this Monster's Max Mana.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 11)

skills.name: Mana Stability
skills.description: Increase Defense by 15% of this Monster's Max Mana.

skills.name: Mass Restore
skills.description: Heal all for (200 + 70% Magic) Removes 1 Debuff from all allies

skills.name: Mass Restore Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (175 + 40% Magic) Removes 1 Debuff from all allies

skills.name: Mass Restore Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (250 + 50% Magic) Removes 2 Debuffs from all allies

skills.name: Mega Restore
skills.description: Heal all for 3 x (250 + 40% Magic) Removes 3 Debuffs from all allies

skills.name: Multi Chill
skills.description: Aura: Chill (Debuff) can be stacked two additional times on enemies. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Multi Shock
skills.description: Aura: Shock (Debuff) can be stacked two additional times on enemies. Additional stacks have only a 50% chance to trigger.

skills.name: Overcast
skills.description: Increases the Mana Cost of all attacks, healing and shielding actions by 10% and the power by 15%.

skills.name: Proliferate
skills.description: When applying a Debuff, trigger an additional 30% damage hit.

skills.name: Restore
skills.description: Heal target for 4 x (50 + 20% Magic) Removes 1 Debuff

skills.name: Restore Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (60 + 25% Magic) Removes 2 Debuffs

skills.name: Restore Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (70 + 25% Magic) Removes 3 Debuffs

skills.name: Restore Lvl 4
skills.description: Heal target for 6 x (100 + 25% Magic) Removes 3 Debuffs

skills.name: Restore Lvl 5
skills.description: Heal target for 7 x (120 + 25% Magic) Removes 4 Debuffs

skills.name: Saboteur's Shield
skills.description: Apply Shield equal to 50% of own defense when applying a Debuff.

skills.name: Shocking Current
skills.description: Every Wind attack hit has a 15% chance to apply Shock.

skills.name: Sonic Assault
skills.description: 5 x 75% (375%) magical damage (neutral) Applies Weakness (Debuff)

skills.name: Sonic Assault Lvl 2
skills.description: 6 x 80% (480%) magical damage (neutral) Applies Weakness (Debuff)

skills.name: Sonic Wave
skills.description: 2 x 60% (120%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 15% chance to apply Weakness (Debuff).

skills.name: Sonic Wave Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 80% (160%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 15% chance to apply Weakness (Debuff).

skills.name: Sonic Wave Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 110% (220%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 15% chance to apply Weakness (Debuff).

skills.name: Sonic Wave Lvl 4
skills.description: 2 x 140% (280%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 15% chance to apply Weakness (Debuff).

skills.name: Sub Zero
skills.description: Unique Aura: Chill causes enemies affected by it to take 10% increased damage.

skills.name: Thunder Strike
skills.description: 1 x 370% magical damage (wind) Deals additional 3 x 20% (60%)  damage if the target has Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Thunder Strike Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 460% magical damage (wind) Deals additional 4 x 20% (80%)  damage if the target has Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Toxic Reaction
skills.description: Unique Aura: When an enemy receives Shock damage, there is a 40% chance to apply Poison.

skills.name: Voltage
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) magical damage (wind) Applies Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Voltage Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) magical damage (wind) Applies Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Voltage Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 55% (275%) magical damage (wind) Applies Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Voltage Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 55% (330%) magical damage (wind) Applies Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Voltage Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 70% (420%) magical damage (wind) Applies Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Water Resistance
skills.description: Water damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Wind Resistance
skills.description: Wind damage reduced by 50%

drops.name: Craft Box
drops.description: Consume to get random craft materials based on Keeper Rank.

drops.name: Skill Potion
drops.description: Grants a skill point. Can only be consumed once per Monster
